mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attachment(attachment_file_name, attachment_file_path, attachment_file_size, attachment_file_type, post_id) values (#{attachmentFileName}, #{attachmentFilePath}, #{attachmentFileSize}, #{attachmentFileType}, #{postId})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.attachment_file_name, a.attachment_file_path, a.attachment_file_size, a.attachment_file_type, a.post_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date from tbl_attachment a join tbl_post p on a.post_id = p.id where a.id = #{id}
